channel.title: A question about my runserver window
channel.description: Is there anyway to make it so when I click runserver.bat it will also open up a box just for chats in-game? My runserver window shows chat and text that my players are saying but it's hard to read it with all the extra information that comes up. Is it possible to make a separate window to only show text in-game when I run my server?

item.title: A question about my runserver window
item.dc:creator: @BlazezFire BlazezFire
item.description:

I was talking about him don’t answer this topic if your just going to say google then explan how to do something…

item.title: A question about my runserver window
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

ya, you could make a JFrame, that contained a jTextArea, make it not editable, and then make everything that is typed, area.append(typedtext).
